name: en-bici-nft
description: ## Step 1: Set Up Project Structure Using Hardhat 1. Create a .env file at the top-level of the project 2. Open the .env file and add in a GOERLI_URL. 3. Add a PRIVATE_KEY from a test Goerli account. Your .env should look like this: GOERLI_URL=https://eth-goerli.g.alchemy.com/v2/--- PRIVATE_KEY=--- 4. ```npm install --save-dev hardhat ```
